CustomField.description: Displays the conference start in central time as a text field (Jan 01, 2019)
CustomField.formula: IF( ( DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c) >= DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c)),3,14) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c)),3,14) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) && DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c) < DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c)),11, 7) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c)),11, 7) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) ) , CASE( MONTH(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c+(-5 / 24))), 1, "Jan ", 2, "Feb ", 3, "Mar ", 4, "Apr ", 5, "May ", 6, "Jun ", 7, "Jul ", 8, "Aug ", 9, "Sep ", 10, "Oct ", 11, "Nov ", 12, "Dec ", " " ) & Text(Day(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c+(-5 / 24)))) & ", " & Text(Year(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c+(-5 / 24)))) & " " & MID(TEXT((DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Call_Start__c))+(-5 / 24))), 12, 5) , CASE( MONTH(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c+(-6 / 24))), 1, "Jan ", 2, "Feb ", 3, "Mar ", 4, "Apr ", 5, "May ", 6, "Jun ", 7, "Jul ", 8, "Aug ", 9, "Sep ", 10, "Oct ", 11, "Nov ", 12, "Dec ", " " ) & Text(Day(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c+(-6 / 24)))) & ", " & Text(Year(DATEVALUE(Call_Start__c+(-6 / 24)))) & " " & MID(TEXT((DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Call_Start__c))+(-6 / 24))), 12, 5) )
CustomField.label: Central Time
